Class GameSessionDAO

java.lang.Object
dao.GameSessionDAO
public class GameSessionDAO extends Object
DAO class for managing game sessions in the database.

Provides CRUD operations for storing and retrieving sessions of games played by clients, including the results of bets.

Since:
3.3
Author:
Davitroon

    • GameSessionDAO

  • Method Details

    • addGameSession

      public void addGameSession(Client client, Game game, double betResult, int userId, Connection connection)
      Inserts a new game session into the database.
      Parameters:
      client - the Client participating in the game session. Must have a valid ID.
      game - the Game in which the session is taking place. Must have an ID and a type ("Blackjack" or "Slotmachine").
      betResult - resulting amount of the bet (positive if the client wins, negative if they lose).
      userId - the ID of the user associated with this session.
      connection - active database Connection.
      Since:
      3.3

    • queryGameSessions

      public ResultSet queryGameSessions(int userId, Connection connection)
      Retrieves all game sessions for a specific user.
      Parameters:
      userId - the ID of the user whose game sessions are queried.
      connection - active database Connection.
      Returns:
      ResultSet containing the game session records, or null if an exception occurs.
      Since:
      3.3

    • deleteGameSession

      public void deleteGameSession(int userId, Connection connection)
      Deletes all game sessions associated with a specific user.
      Parameters:
      userId - the ID of the user whose sessions should be deleted.
      connection - active database Connection.
      Since:
      3.3
